front.title: IP Router Alert Considerations and Usage

abstract.t: The IP Router Alert Option is an IP option that alerts transitrouters to more closely examine the contents of an IP packet. RSVP,PGM, IGMP/MLD, MRD and GIST are some of the protocols that make useof the IP Router Alert option. This document discusses securityaspects and usage guidelines around the use of the current IP RouterAlert option. Specifically, it provides recommendation against usingthe Router Alert in the end-to-end open Internet as well as identifycontrolled environments where protocols depending on Router Alert canbe used safely. It also provides recommendation about protectionapproaches for Service Providers. Finally it provides briefguidelines for Router Alert implementation on routers.
